description:
Ted says he is "pretty much gay."

"I've had girlfriends in the past," he told us. "But it's been a while."

"What happened?"

"Girls are a lot of work," he said, laughing. "Guys are easier."

Ted is 32 and he loves being in his thirties.

"It's a great age," he said. "You're still young but you've got your head on your shoulders."

He's got a hot, lean body with a nice hairy chest. He said he works out four to five times a week, in addition to running and doing gymnastics.

"So are you a top or bottom?"

"It depends on the situation," he said. "I like big, muscle guys and with them I usually get fucked!"
title: Ted
